summary:
Aerosmith, formed in 1970, is a legendary American rock band from Boston. With members like Steven Tyler (vocals) and Joe Perry (guitar), they've sold over 150 million records worldwide. Their hard rock style, mixed with pop and metal, made them super popular. They had hits like "Dream On" and "Walk This Way."

In the 1980s, the band faced struggles but made a huge comeback with the album "Permanent Vacation" and a collaboration with Run-D.M.C. They won many awards and had number-one hits like "I Don't Want to Miss a Thing." Aerosmith is in the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and is known as "America's Greatest Rock and Roll Band."
title: Aerosmith
